title: This Website
subtitle: SvelteKit
description: This is my first completed website made with SvelteKit! It is self-hosted using Nginx and Cloudflare on a Raspberry Pi 4 at my home.

title: My Old Website
subtitle: Static HTML
description: I made this with it being portfolio in mind, but ended up not finishing it. This was the first time I really dived into learning CSS.

title: Gravity Simulator V2
subtitle: OpenGL
description: I know this looks similar to Gravity Simulator V1, but trust me it's so much cooler. Its cover image is literally 3 bodies orbiting each other o_o.

title: Gravity Simulator V1
subtitle: SDL2
description: This project was the project that taught me all about C++ and memory management. I used SDL2 to render all the planet (circles) and it just introduced me into computer graphics.

title: Science Fair
subtitle: Winner 2023*
description: This was the website I made for the 2023 science fair at my school. It was a quiz website where you had to choose if an image or poem was real or AI generated.

title: Learn to Code
subtitle: WIP
description: The ultimate free website to learning to code. It will incorporate Project-Based learning and Just-in-Time learning for both entertainment and effectiveness. However, it is still a work-in-progress.

title: Vocab Site
subtitle: Vocab Practice
description: I made this website because I wanted to help my classmates memorize Hamlet vocabulary for my English class. It is a very interesting project because it highlights the importance of UX and UI design.
